description: Try our easy to follow Granola Balls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Granola Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put the blueberries in a pan with 1 tablespoon of water. Bring to the boil and simmer until the blueberries are really soft and squishy. Add the maple syrup and coconut oil and heat through until combined.

Combine all the other ingredients in a big bowl. Add the blueberry mixture to the dry mixture and stir until well combined. The mixture will be sticky. Divided into 16 evenly sized portions and roll into balls.
Refrigerate for 1 hour before eating raw.
